welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, a charming city known for its historic architecture, beautiful parks, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all the wonderful attractions this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Jean Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Jean Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bromont Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bromont Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
